const response = await client.indices.create({
  index: "events",
  settings: {
    index: {
      "sort.field": "timestamp",
      "sort.order": "desc",
    },
  },
  mappings: {
    properties: {
      timestamp: {
        type: "date",
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);
